name: Icy Fruit Hockey
description:
Icy Fruit Hockey is easy to play. You can play Icy Fruit Hockey alone or with your friends.
Features:
- 1 player, 3 difficulty levels: easy, medium, hard
- 2 players
- realistic physics
- multitouch controlls
With Icy Fruit Hockey you restrict the players movement to their own side of the screen, tap and bash the puck into your players net.
